alert.note: Alert for Milwaukee; Waukesha (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 24 at 4:18PM CDT until August 24 at 5:00PM CDT by NWS Milwaukee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Milwaukee/Sullivan has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Milwaukee County in southeastern Wisconsin... Southeastern Waukesha County in southeastern Wisconsin... * Until 500 PM CDT. * At 418 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Allis, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Milwaukee, West Allis, Wauwatosa, New Berlin, Brookfield, Greenfield, Oak Creek, Muskego, South Milwaukee, Cudahy, Greendale, St. Francis, Hales Corners, Elm Grove, West Milwaukee, Franklin, Milwaukee Hoan Bridge, State Fair Park, Marquette University, and Mitchell Park Domes. People attending Milwaukee Mile at State Fair Park should seek safe shelter immediately! Other landmarks included are the following Locations Boerner Botanical Gardens, General Mitchell International Airport, Froedert & the Medical College, and Fiserv Forum. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
